item.title: Danti add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "All endings are also beginnings. We just don't know it at the time." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Danti add a quote by James A. Baldwin
item.description: "Love does not begin and end the way we seem to think it does. Love is a battle, love is a war; love is a growing up." -- James A. Baldwin

item.title: Danti add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Danti add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Danti add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "So, I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Danti add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Danti add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everyone seems to have a clear idea of how other people should lead their lives, but none about his or her own." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Danti add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "This is what we call love. When you are loved, you can do anything in creation. When you are loved, there's no need at all to understand what's happening, because everything happens within you." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Danti add a quote by Thomas Fuller
item.description: "It is said that the darkest hour of the night comes just before the dawn." -- Thomas Fuller

item.title: Danti add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "The simple things are also the most extraordinary things, and only the wise can see them." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Danti add a quote by Umar Kayam
item.description: "Priyayi utama itu, Sastro, tidak hanya akan gagah dalam kemenangan, tetapi juga dalam kekalahan." -- Umar Kayam

item.title: Danti add a quote by Dee
item.description: "Seindah apa pun huruf terukir, dapatkah ia bermakna apabila tak ada jeda? Dapatkah ia dimengerti jika tak ada spasi?" -- Dee

item.title: Danti add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Danti add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Danti add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Danti add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Danti add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Danti add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Danti add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Danti add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Danti add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Danti add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Danti add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Danti add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Danti add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "What can you do to promote world peace? Go home and love your family." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Danti add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "A thousand half-loves must be forsaken to take one whole heart home." -- Rumi

item.title: Danti add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "What you seek is seeking you." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Danti add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Danti add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Your emotions are the slaves to your thoughts, and you are the slave to your emotions." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Danti add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Tis' better to live your own life imperfectly than to imitate someone else's perfectly." -- Elizabeth Gilbert
